20110120204531.000|20110120204534.000|TR0| But my question to you is this.  How in 
20110120204534.000|20110120204536.000|TR0|the world did investigators use the image 
20110120204536.000|20110120204539.000|TR0|of the killer's hands to corroborate with 
20110120204539.000|20110120204541.000|TR0|KSM's confession he did it, he beheaded 
20110120204541.000|20110120204543.000|TR0|Daniel pearl?
20110120204543.000|20110120204546.000|TR0|
20110120204546.000|20110120204548.000|TR0|DR. LAWRENCE KOBILINSKI, FORENSIC 
20110120204548.000|20110120204551.000|TR0|SCIENTIST:  Well, brook, this is not a 
20110120204551.000|20110120204553.000|TR0|routine standard procedure in the arsenal 
20110120204553.000|20110120204556.000|TR0|of criminalists.  What it is based upon is 
20110120204556.000|20110120204558.000|TR0|the fact that the major vessels in the 
20110120204558.000|20110120204600.000|TR0|hand or any other place on the body remain 
20110120204600.000|20110120204603.000|TR0|in the same position throughout one's 
20110120204603.000|20110120204605.000|TR0|lifetime barring some kind of clinical 
20110120204605.000|20110120204608.000|TR0|intervention so that if you can capture an 
20110120204608.000|20110120204610.000|TR0|image of the position of the veins from 
20110120204610.000|20110120204613.000|TR0|that video, you can then compare it to a 
20110120204613.000|20110120204615.000|TR0|known image.
20110120204615.000|20110120204617.000|TR0|
20110120204617.000|20110120204620.000|TR0|In other words, you're doing what we call 
20110120204620.000|20110120204622.000|TR0|biometrics making measurements based upon 
20110120204622.000|20110120204625.000|TR0|the position of the venous structure in 
20110120204625.000|20110120204627.000|TR0|the hand, and if the two patterns match, 
20110120204627.000|20110120204630.000|TR0|you can then say, well, it's the same 
20110120204630.000|20110120204632.000|TR0|person.  It's very easy to exclude.  It's 
20110120204632.000|20110120204634.000|TR0|a little harder to include a person as the 
20110120204634.000|20110120204637.000|TR0|source.
20110120204637.000|20110120204639.000|TR0|
20110120204639.000|20110120204642.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  How in the world can you look at
